question: The Prime Minister of India recently inaugurated five Young Scientists Labs of which organisation?
option2: Defence Research and Development Organisation, DRDO
answer: Defence Research and Development Organisation, DRDO
explanation: The Prime Minister of India, Narendra Modi recently launched five new defence laboratories called DRDO Young Scientists Laboratories (DYSL) for the Defence Research and Development Organisation from Bengaluru, Karnataka. The labs will operate from five Indian cities, namely Bengaluru, Mumbai, Chennai, Hyderabad and Kolkatta. They will focus on developing new and innovative defence technologies for our country and thus enhance our self reliance in the field.
